item.title: Which Loop Is Faster
item.description: int a[N * N]; // Loop #1 for (int i = 0; i < N; ++i) for (int j = 0; j < N; ++j) sum += a[i * N + j]; // Loop #2 for (int i = 0; i < N; ++i) for (int j = 0; j < N; ++j) sum += a[j * N + i]; The first loop access the memory sequentially from the beginning to the end of the array.
